channel.title: documentat'n on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Recent content in documentat'n on Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme

item.title: Installat'n
item.description: Th' follow'n steps be here t' help ye initialize yer new website. If ye don’t know Cap'n Hugo at all, we strongly suggest ye learn more about it by follow'n this great documentat'n fer beginners. Create yer project Cap'n Hugo provides a new command t' create a new website. hugo new ship <new_project>Install th' theme Install th' Relearrrn theme by follow'n this documentat'n us'n Hugo’s module system. This theme’s repository be: https://github.
